## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f4628140ad8ca2bfe8fde97530e932f9f26df49b3841157bc7f8aa50535e77f7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'xp-anti-fraud-js-lib' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
